about.title: About Me
description: I'm a passionate developer with 5+ years of experience in creating innovative web solutions. I specialize in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies, always striving to deliver pixel-perfect designs and seamless user experiences.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee while reading about the latest tech innovations.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: A modern e-commerce solution built with Next.js, featuring real-time inventory management and secure payment processing.

items.title: Task Management App
items.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

items.title: AI-Powered Analytics
items.description: A data visualization dashboard that uses machine learning to provide insights and predictions for business metrics.

items.title: Weather Forecast App
items.description: A beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and personalized weather alerts.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Let's create something amazing together.
